General.Name: Proya Cosmetics Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Proya Cosmetics Co.,Ltd., a beauty and personal care company, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of cosmetics in China. It offers its products under the Proya, TIMAGE, Off&Relax, Hapsode, CORRECTORS, INSBAHA, UZERO, and Anya brands. The company markets its products through dealers, franchise stores, supermarkets, and single item stores, as well as through e-commerce. The company was formerly known as Proya (Huzhou) Cosmetics Co., Ltd. Proya Cosmetics Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
